-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Serialize Data to XML (strings).
--   
--   <tt>Text.XML.Generic</tt> can automatically serialize from the
--   Data-type class to XML-strings.
@package text-xml-generic
@version 0.1.1

module Text.XML.Generic
decodeXML :: (Data a) => String -> Either String a
fromXML :: (Data d) => Element -> Either String d
encodeXML :: (Data a) => a -> String

-- | Serialize to XML.
toXML :: (Data a) => a -> Element
instance Monad (Either String)
